LanguageData.HC_Kelpie.label: Kelpie
LanguageData.HC_Kelpie.description: A legendary creature in the shape of a horse, it has the skin of an amphibian, and is said to wait for its prey in a swamp or water just like its appearance.
LanguageData.HC_Kelpie.tools.0.label: head
LanguageData.HC_Kelpie.tools.1.label: left hoof
LanguageData.HC_Kelpie.tools.2.label: right hoof
